Class SoundManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.SoundManager
public final class SoundManager extends Object
Manages all sound effects in the game. Provides centralized sound effect playback with automatic resource management.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    dispose()
    Disposes all sound effects and cleans up resources.
    static void
    playSound(String soundName)
    Plays a sound effect if sound effects are enabled.
    static void
    setSoundVolume(String soundName, double volume)
    Sets the volume for a specific sound effect.
    static void
    stopAllSounds()
    Stops and disposes all sound effects.

    Stops and disposes a specific sound effect.

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • playSound

      public static void playSound(String soundName)
      Plays a sound effect if sound effects are enabled.
      Parameters:
      soundName - The name of the sound file (without path and extension) e.g., "fall" for "sfx/fall.mp3"

    • stopSound

      public static void stopSound(String soundName)
      Stops and disposes a specific sound effect.
      Parameters:
      soundName - The name of the sound to stop

    • stopAllSounds

      public static void stopAllSounds()
      Stops and disposes all sound effects.

    • setSoundVolume

      public static void setSoundVolume(String soundName, double volume)
      Sets the volume for a specific sound effect.
      Parameters:
      soundName - The name of the sound
      volume - The volume (0.0 to 1.0)

    • dispose

      public static void dispose()
      Disposes all sound effects and cleans up resources. Should be called when the application is closing.
